text: Aminul Haque (; 1942 or 1943 â€“ 21 April 2019) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was a member of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP). He served as the country's Minister of Post and Telecommunications from 2001 to 2006. He was also a member of parliament for Rajshahi-1 from 1991 to 2006. Outside of politics, he was a barrister. Haque died of liver cancer on 21 April 2019 in Dhaka. He was 73. ==References== Category:1940s births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Rajshahi Division Category:Bangladeshi lawyers Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:6th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:8th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Aminul Haque
